artist: Designer: George Washington Maher; Manufacturer: Gorham Manufacturing Company; Retailer: Spaulding & Company, Chicago, Illinois
creditline: Gift of funds from the Decorative Arts Council with proceeds from the 2005 Antiques Show and Sale
description: round bowl; handle decorated with long-stemmed lilies with two flowers and two buds and EKG monogram
markings: on back of handle, stamped: [SPAULDING & CO. CHICAGO]; on side of handle, stamped: [(lion) (anchor) G (?)/ Martelé]; on opposite side of handle, stamped: [9584]
object_name: Soup spoon, from a twelve-piece place setting
title: Soup spoon, from a twelve-piece place setting
